item.title: Which Education Route is best for our Child?
item.description: Which is best for our child, Academic path? Design/Art path? or Both of them? I would argue, none of them. Based on my experience who graduated from an engineering degree, then worked as a strategic management staff and afterward founded a business in Packaging Design. I know that most of the problem happens in the workplace is about communication, not hard-skills. If you put a designer, an engineer and a sales in a closed room with a coffee machine, most of the problem with disappear.
